item.title: Rubbish dumped amongst the trees on King George V Recreation Ground, 4th August
item.description:
7972816 The above reference number has been reported as cleared, but I've been on the field this evening and it's still there. Nothing has been cleared.

item.title: 40-50 black bags dumped, full of garden waste, and broken household items, 4th August
item.description:
Since saturday 2nd August there have been 40-50 dumped black bags full of garden waste, rubble, and broken household waste. The problem was listed as "fixed" yet it remains there as of 7pm 4th August. This is obstructing the pathway on green chain walk/Thames path round the back of corinthian manorway and galleon close. Put enforcement cameras there!! This is the 4th time in 3 weeks that fly tipping has occurred there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corinthian Manorway, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
